WorkItem.Description:
Add a KML custom "InfoTool" layer.  Save the uploaded KML file onto the client database and reload them when the app refresh.  Allow it to be removed on command.


Development time:  the actual time took too create the module is less than 4 hours,  however it took me 6 hours figuring out how to do context menu from the GeoExt Layer Tree to remove the added module.
WorkItem.Summary: Add a KML layer which is not scored
